intro: I am a Backend Developer with hands-on experience in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB through real-time internship projects. Continuously improving skills to contribute effectively to development teams.

sections.title: About Me
sections.description: Hi, I'm Kuntal, a problem-solving-oriented developer with over a year of hands-on experience in building scalable web applications and enjoy working on unique projects.

sections.title: Experience
sections.description: I have completed internships in web development, gaining experience in backend technologies. These opportunities have helped me enhance my skills in JavaScript, PHP, Node.js, and database management.

sections.title: Education
sections.description: I am currently pursuing a BTech in Computer Science and Engineering from West Bengal. Through my coursework and practical experience, I have built a strong foundation in software development, system design, and problem-solving.

sections.title: Skills
sections.description: I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, PHP, MySQL, MongoDB, Git, and more. I enjoy applying these technologies to develop efficient and scalable web applications.

sections.title: Projects
sections.description: I have developed various web applications, chatbots, and social networking platforms using modern tech stacks. My projects highlight my problem-solving abilities and my passion for building impactful software solutions.

sections.title: Contact
sections.description: Feel free to connect with me via LinkedIn, email, or WhatsApp for job opportunities, collaborations, or technical discussions. I'm always open to new challenges and networking.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: I have hands-on experience with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, PHP, MySQL, and MongoDB, focusing on building scalable and efficient applications.

faqs.question: Can you tell us about your project experience?
faqs.answer: Sure! I built Social Clubs, a MERN Stack based social media platform for posting, news updates, engagement, and real-time chat.

faqs.question: How can we get in touch with you?
faqs.answer: You can connect with me on LinkedIn, drop me an email, or message me on WhatsApp.

projects.title: CodeSena
projects.description: A coding platform featuring real-world frontend, backend, and full-stack projects with a custom admin panel.

projects.title: Kuntal's Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio showcasing my skills, projects, and professional journey.

projects.title: Social Tunes
projects.description: A music-themed social app for sharing playlists and syncing with friends in real-time.

projects.title: Social Clubs
projects.description: A platform for connecting people, sharing interests, and organizing events.

projects.title: GitHub User Compare
projects.description: Compare any two GitHub users side-by-side with detailed stats and an overall score to quickly identify who’s winning in followers, stars, repos, activity, and more.

projects.title: YouTube Channel Tracker
projects.description: Track any YouTube channel by handle and get public stats like subscriber count, total views, video insights, engagement rate, and estimated earnings.

projects.title: Step Form
projects.description: A multi-step form with validation and smooth UI for better user interaction.

projects.title: E-commerce Page
projects.description: A responsive e-commerce page that fetches products from an API and allows filtering.
